content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the trend in the graph?

choices.label: The Chinese GDP has consistently declined since 2007.
The Chinese GDP has been shrinking since 2005, scaring investors away.
The Chinese GDP has seen growth since 2003, with growth stronger some years than others.
The Chinese GDP has both increased and decreased since 2009.

content.answer: The Chinese GDP has seen growth since 2003, with growth stronger some years than others.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
